distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for cvs fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2017-12836: A leading dash in the argument of the '-d' option could lead to argument injection (bsc#1053364)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: CVS 1.12.x, when configured to use SSH for remote repositories, might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a repository URL with a crafted hostname, as demonstrated by "-oProxyCommand=id;localhost:/bar."
notes.title: CVE description
